# {title}

Sending text line to connected Client.

NB: This text sending only to client, not to server!


Pascal

```pascal
procedure ClientPrint(Text : String)
```



Python
```python

ClientPrint(Text)
```


Example Pascal

```pascal
PROGRAM Test;
begin
//some preparation
  ClientPrint('Script loaded :)');
//main script body
 
end.
```
